definitions.definition: A pattern , characterised by diagonal ridges, created by the regular interlacing of threads of the warp and weft during weaving .
A cloth or portion of cloth woven in such a pattern.

main_definition: ( weaving ) A pattern , characterised by diagonal ridges, created by the regular interlacing of threads of the warp and weft during weaving .
secondary_definitions: A cloth or portion of cloth woven in such a pattern.
